name: Koisan
description: KOISAN WORLD NFT GAME is one of KIC project. Inspired by pokemon and Axie Infinity, Koisan World is a Play to Earn Game using blockchain to generate the koi's character so that each koi will never be the same with another koi. And also Koisan World is using blockchain to reward player when winning the game as well as complete the quest. Inspired by Koi Fish Lover Community Koisan character was created.
